title: Access the CDC PLACES API
text: package allows users seamlessly query Centers Disease Control Prevention’s (CDC) Population Level Analysis Community Estimates (PLACES) API. CDC’s website: >PLACES collaboration CDC, Robert Wood Johnson Foundation, CDC Foundation. PLACES provides health data small areas across country. allows local health departments jurisdictions, regardless population size rurality, better understand burden geographic distribution health measures areas assist planning public health interventions. > >PLACES provides model-based, population-level analysis community estimates health measures counties, places (incorporated census designated places), census tracts, ZIP Code Tabulation Areas (ZCTAs) across United States. information data set’s methodology measure definitions refer CDC PLACES website.

title: Access the CDC PLACES API
text: install latest development version run: install CRAN:

title: Access the CDC PLACES API
text: get_places — function query PLACES API. Arguments allows user specify geography (census/county), state, measure, release (2020-2023). get_dictionary — function pull full list measures available PLACES data set.

title: Access the CDC PLACES API
text: view complete walk package, view vignette found . can also view pkgdown site .

what: View the 'CDC PLACES' data dictionary — get_dictionary
title: View the 'CDC PLACES' data dictionary — get_dictionary
text: function provides user data frame shows available measures PLACES data set release years measures included. #'

title: View the 'CDC PLACES' data dictionary — get_dictionary
View the 'CDC PLACES' data dictionary — get_dictionary
View the 'CDC PLACES' data dictionary — get_dictionary
code: # First save the data dictionary <- get_dictionary() # Then view the data frame # View(dictionary)

what: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
title: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
text: Use function access CDC PLACES API data. Measures sourced Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System American Community Survey ACS.

title: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
code: get_places(   geo = "county",   state = NULL,   measure = NULL,   release = "2023",   geometry = FALSE )

title: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
text: geo level desired geography. Currently supports 'county' 'census'. state Specify state desired data using two letter abbreviation. Supports multiple states desired. measure Specify measures data pull. Supports multiple states desired. full list available measures, see function 'get_dictionary'. release Specify year release PLACES data set. Currently supports years 2020-2023. geometry FALSE (default), return regular data frame PLACES data. TRUE, uses tigris package return sf data frame simple feature geometry 'geometry' column.

title: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
text: tibble contains observations measure (adjusted unadjusted prevalence) geographic level.

title: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
